name: The GREATEST Tower Defense Game. Ever. Seriously. Everyone Says It's The Best
name_original: The GREATEST Tower Defense Game. Ever. Seriously. Everyone Says It's The Best
description:
"The GREATEST Tower Defense Game. Ever. Seriously. Everyone Says It's The Best," is a game about defending your town from a horde of goblins by blowing them up from your towns wall. 

Features:

  • Around 5 min of gameplay. 
  • Two endings.
  • Mouse controls as only input

Controls:

All mouse based. Just hover the target over what you want to interact with for 3 seconds!
